channel.title: Having trouble running server on vps as opposed to own computer
channel.description:
Having trouble getting a server working on my vps. Have installed jdk and edited the classpath and path etc, changed the run.bat and compiler to the version of jdk i installed on it, and installed normal java but am still faced with the following when attempting to run server
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/715/vps.png[/img]
whereas on my computer it works fine (exact same server files) [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/4990/compoz.png[/img]
all help appreciated
